WelcomeScreen.descripcion: Streaming Community Awards for Spanish Speakers

WelcomeText.parrafoUno: While the film industry has the Oscars and the music industry has the Grammys, streaming has the ESLAND Awards. These awards celebrate the creativity and talent of the best content creators in the Spanish-speaking community.
WelcomeText.parrafoDos: Spain, Latin America, and Andorra come together for creators and their communities, to reminisce and relive some of the best moments of the year.
WelcomeText.parrafoTres: After two successful ceremonies, one at the Palau de la Música Catalana in Barcelona, and another at the National Auditorium in Mexico City, we eagerly await the third edition in Andorra.

EslandGuide.titulo: GUIDE TO THE 3RD EDITION OF THE ESLAND AWARDS

derechos.title: © ESLAND 2021 - 2024 All rights reserved. - Website developed for educational purposes.

Vota.descripcion: The most crucial moment has arrived. Cast your vote in the 3rd Edition of the Awards. Here are some tips to ensure your votes are counted correctly:
Vota.itemUno: Vote, in order of preference, for up to 4 nominees per category.
Vota.itemDos: Voting in every category is not mandatory.
Vota.itemTres: While not mandatory, using ranked voting is recommended.
Vota.itemCuatro: Once you've made your choice, be sure to click “submit my votes”.
Vota.itemCinco: Remember to share your votes on social media.
Vota.itemSeis: Choose wisely and review your votes; you only get one chance.
Vota.footer: Voting will be open until Sunday, January 14th at 12:00 AM (Spanish time)

galeria.title: GALLERY
galeria.description: Capture some of the gala's most memorable moments that will go down in history.
